hackathon-description-text: Techweek is proud to host a 24-hour hackathon - join developers and hackers for an all-day frenzy of fun, camaraderie and coding. At the end, each team will have created an entirely new application that they will showcase to a panel of judges in the hopes of being crowned the winners!

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Chief Product and Information Officer / Multiservice

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The team will receive $2500 in cash. Each member will also receive a round trip plane ticket and a VIP Pass to the Techweek 2016 conference city of their choice.
The runner up team will receive 5 Attendee Passes to the Techweek 2016 Conference of their choice, (valued at approx. $500).
Each member of the winning team will receive a Spark Core Maker Chip.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Innovative Use of IBM Bluemix

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each member of the winning team will receive a Garmin Vívoactive™ smart watch.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Most Innovative Use of Cerner Health API

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=210 West 19 Terrace, Kansas City, MO 64108, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Are you solving a real problem in an interesting way? 
You are not required to explain how your app makes money, unless that is part of the problem you solve.
How much progress did you make on your application?

hackathon-location-address: 210 West 19 Terrace, Kansas City, MO 64108, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join us at the Sprint Accelerator for the Innaugaural Techweek Kansas City Hackathon
